message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your pricing. However, I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your counter-offer, but $12,000 is a little too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $12,500.
